exp.libs.sock.websock

Class WebSockClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • exp.libs.utils.concurrent.LoopThread
        • exp.libs.sock.websock.WebSockClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class WebSockClient
extends LoopThread
     websocket客户端.
 -----------------------
        注：若启用了心跳模式, 则在会话close后, 对象不可再用(因为同一个线程无法被启动两次)

    PROJECT : exp-libs
    SUPPORT : https://exp-blog.com
    Since:
    JDK 1.8+
    Version:
    2022-03-06
    Author:
    EXP: exp.lqb@foxmail.com
